website_summaries.verdict: The Beats Powerbeats3 Wireless earphones use the Apple W1 chip for superior Bluetooth performance and deliver a highly sculpted, bass-forward audio experience.
pros: Powerful audio performance for bass lovers
Uses Apple W1 chip for quick pairing, better connectivity with iOS devices
cons: Insanely boosted bass and sculpted highs aren't for anyone seeking an accurate sound signature

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy in to all the hype
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of earphones to use while I run or workout at the gym and I thought I would give Beats a try to see what the hype was about as they were on offer. These earphones were originally £149 but, got them for £99 and even then I felt these were not worth the price. Although these earphones are packed in very nice Apple-inspired packaging, they felt cheap and the sound quality was terrible. I could not find a suitable fit and all of the eartips provided were extremely uncomfortable. I returned these for a refund and will be looking at other options.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great until the faults started two weeks in....
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great initially. Quick to charge, good battery life and a great fit with little or no movement when running. Then after two weeks they developed the popular fault. First they turned off for no reason half way through a run and then they would only work after a hard reset each time. Finally I got red and white flashing lights and then no charge at all. They don't even turn on now so I guess it's a battery fault. Full refund from Amazon which is great but, with this being a popular fault I'm reluctant to re-buy. Looking at Bose as an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Florian

customer_reviews.title: Almost awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and then got enticed to buy Powerbeats3. The holders on these seem to be a little loose around the ears (even though I have big ears!) whereas the PB3 has a really nice tight fit around not allowing much movement. PB3 overall have a cleaner and crisper sound, but the MPOW is louder and has a much deeper bass note ultimately making the MPOW more enjoyable to listen too overall. Though if you max out the MPOW the bass can distort a little. I returned the PB3 as I could not justify the price difference between the two where the MPOW has sound which is almost just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: ... whom it may concern Product sound quality is very good but after some use the right side of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello to whom it may concern Product sound quality is very good but after some use the right side of the unit wire is broken. It’s not even one year since I bought these. I hope you can help me to sort/repair these out. Let me know. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice earphones- bad manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: pros - sounds good I found it had no problem whilst at the gym you can bend the ear prices to fit your ear too so for sure they don’t move. Quick charge. Cons - expensive and like a lot of the other reviews here my first pair after a month we’re unable to be charged again - the battery just goes to zero I tried charging from different sources and it just stops working- so you’ll need to contact apple support and they will fix/replace
customer_reviews.author: James Baird

customer_reviews.title: Light in weight big in sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my old beats ear phones, which broke, and must say what an improvement. They are very light and very quickly you forget you have them on. Pairing to mobile through Bluetooth is very easy. Sound quality is what you expect from these and is awesome. The controls are easy to use - not made a call from them yet so can’t comment on speech or sound quality. The various earbuds make them very comfy. The only downside I have is that with the control pod on the left side, the cable tends to pull on that side - not a great deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Russell

customer_reviews.title: Bass takes over music.
customer_reviews.text: I was always a bit skeptical when it comes to beats as I am well aware or the brand and it's well known that beats has intensive bass in their built. However I wasn't expecting this to take over the rest of the music (mids, highs and vocals) sometimes. This is a perfect product in terms of ergonomics and the way it fits your ear, however if you appreciate sound quality and listen to different music, I wouldn't recommend. If you are into hip hop and pop music you should be fine. It's a pitty but I'll be returning mine after couple minutes of tests and different music styles played.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these since September and they have already broken. Working one day no issues and then refusing to charge or switch on the next day. I didn't realise I only had 1 month to return on Amazon. For a product like this I would expect at least a year so I'm going to have to go direct to Beats or Apple. A shame really because when they worked they were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: James M Usher

customer_reviews.title: Great for use at the gym
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym (remember when we pull go to those?!) and they have been great - Purchased at what I thought was a bargain price at the time, so pleased with that - Sound quality is pretty good, haven’t noticed any noise cancellation tbh, but not overly concerned with that - The only gripe I have is the cable that goes round the back of your neck with the volume controls on it can get a little annoying and when running this can dislodge the fit of the headphones, but being Beats, they connect really easily to my iPhone and the battery life is great for these type of ‘phones - Happy overall
customer_reviews.author: Matt Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to free myself from tangled wires. I worked out that I spend about two minutes each gym session untangling my wired headphones - that's a couple of hours a year! The sound quality is good but I had to play around with the interchangeable ear inserts to get it right. Pairs beautifully with my iPhone & Mac. Considered buying the more expensive version without the wire connecting left and right earphones, but the wire doesn't interfere too much an actually helps keep together. Good for making calls.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Oh dear. For £149 I really expected a lot more - poor fitting ear buds over cheap plastic with tinny sound. The £20 Skull Candy headphones I already had were at least as good
customer_reviews.author: Man-O-War1977

customer_reviews.title: Great in ear headphones - maybe the best out there for the price?
customer_reviews.text: The greatest thing about these are battery life for sound quality. I've had a few in ear Bluetooth headphones including jaybirds and cheaper options. The headphones have good battery life. They fit perfectly on my awkward ears thanks to the hooks and stays on when moving around. Little controls are great to use. Sound quality is great especially for a beats in ear headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Asif

customer_reviews.title: TRY ALL THE EAR BUDS!!! Please read!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my wired sport beats. At first I was a little disappointed at the tinny sound quality, but then I remembered another reviewer saying that changing the earbuds makes all the difference (they come with 3 additional sizes). IT REALLY DID! I tried them all and the last ones improved the quality 10 fold. I’m now really pleased with the purchase. They’re comfortable and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Reb NT

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough for me but good value at sale price
customer_reviews.text: Item came 2 days early! So was really pleased! They are really comfy and great for the gym. Once you select the correct ear pieces (you get a variation of sizes included) but for me the sound isn’t loud enough I listen to a lot of podcasts and these don’t drown out the exterior noise as much as the iPhone wired earphones do so that takes some adjustment. I was torn between these and the on ear noise cancelling headphones so maybe should have gone with them but for the price of these I’m happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Hockings

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good but you have to use the correct ear buds or you will loose all bass. Could be louder but thats might be me going deaf. Good for money but i am glad I didn't pay full price. good battery life (approx 9 hours) don't need longer or they will become permanently attached and I cant afford the surgery to have them removed. Would I buy again, possibly not would go for higher end Bose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: frednoggle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. These struggled to keep connection. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. These struggled to keep connection. I had frequent and regular drop outs for over an hour before I conceded defeat and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: These were a present for my sports mad son who likes to run and got very annoyed at wires that after a short time affected the music sound (I find this too). These wireless headphones are amazing and so easy to put on and off. Great that they come with replacement ear sponges. Easy to charge up and a good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Span
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three pairs of these headphones in the last two years and each time after initially working fine they just seem to stop working for no apparent reason. I always take great care with items like this so they have not been damaged. The first two pairs stopped working fairly quickly while this most recent pair that I bought for my mother for Xmas has just stopped working now with the return window long expired in January. I am extremely annoyed and having thought about buying the newest generation of headphones for myself will definitely reconsider as the money being paid for this brand is not matching the quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Xmas gift for my girlfriend she loves them, good sound, blocks out outside noise and very low noise pollution from them. I can’t hear anything while she is wearing them even at a relatively high volume.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Harvey

customer_reviews.title: So worth paying for the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and sound. I had previously purchased cheaper versions due to the secure fit to use in the gym. So worth paying the extra £60 any day of the week. I bought them for the gym mainly but use them now for work overseas conference calls due to being rather good at noise canceling.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Le Cras

customer_reviews.title: The product after 2 weeks it stops to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earphones in January and I have already changed them 3 times. The quality of the sounds and the other technical features of the product are fine but every 3 weeks there is an issue. The first two times I was unable to charge the earphones because there was an issue with the earphones plug and the seller changed the product; while the last time, after 1 month in which they worked fine, any device was able to detect the earphones, I tried to reset them but the results did not change. Don't buy them otherwise you will spend more time trying to fix them rather than use them.
customer_reviews.author: paolo

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, I may have misunderstood
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, I may have misunderstood, but it does not support 2 device at same time. Pairing is easy, behaves like any other bluetooth and sometimes disconnects in middle of call. Purchased for stable connection thinking apple chip. Otherwise good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vettom

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: For the offer I managed to pick these up for I am extremely impressed with how they perform, These are my main earphones over the airpods I own. For me the quality and security of the ear buds are so much better and well thought out with the adjustable ear bud size and over ear hook adjustability. Battery life is brilliant and lives up to the 5 minute charge and 1 hour listening time expectation. Highly recommend this product to gym users , runners or even a general listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Ashton

customer_reviews.text: Sweatproof ??? HELLL NO !!! If you sweat like crazy when you work out forget about it. I’ve had to replace this 3 times and for the 3rd Time I was out of warranty so I had to pay £109 for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Prabhash Gurung

customer_reviews.title: Good gym headphones
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the gym. I'm a bit of a headphone snob but for the price and just for the gym they are great. They are a bit on the chunky side and look like a hearing aid but if you can get over that you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Howson

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for Battery Failure
customer_reviews.text: Having used a few pairs of wired headphone when running, though i would treat myself to a 'proper' pair of wireless headphones. Went for the Powerbeats over Bose because they have the ear-hooks. They worked great for 8 months. Battery has completely gone and they will no longer hold a charge. Various solutions via You Tube haven't fixed the issue. Would have to buy a replacement battery, heat gun and soldering iron to fix the problem. Not what you expect from an expensive product line.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones by a long way
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but felt I deserved to treat myself, bloody fantastic! fit perfect plus you get extra different size ear buds. Sound is excellent, charge quick, feel comfy on. I use them in the gym and the stay in place better than any other headphones or buds I’ve used before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and flawed. Never again will i buy anything from the Beats range.
customer_reviews.text: died after a few months, refused to charge. Just as i feared. Performed well for a while. I found the lack of a charge remaining announcement a pain and the power on button was awkward to use.
customer_reviews.author: PianoNut

customer_reviews.title: Good Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: First pair I purchased just stopped working after 3 months, fortunately Amazon replaced them. since then no issues and sound quality and ease of use is great.
customer_reviews.author: Andy R

customer_reviews.title: Balance choice
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are a wise choice to balance sound quality, price and mobility for gym use. I'm not sure its battery duration but I think it is hard to reach the claimed 12 hrs. The Bluetooth connection is stable and no disconnection in use currently.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always just spent £20-£30 on in ear headphones, and then moan that the Bluetooth keeps dropping, I am so glad I decided to spend more and get what I was hoping would be a decent set. They really are worth the hype in my opinion. The connectivity was instant, the sound quality is brilliant and they are so comfortable and light over your ears, you hardly even know they’re there. An excellent purchase, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola3001

customer_reviews.title: Overall good sound, but not enough bass
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, somewhat comfortable and pretty good build quality, however, I returned the product because of its bass quality, voice is very clear enough treble but for me the bass wasn't good enough compare to its price. Mainly I compared the bass with my existing apple earphones, and this Powerbeats 3 was pretty behind in case of base, however, music is pretty loud and some people might find the bass is ok and overall sound is good, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shuvo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best earphones I've ever owend. They're so much easier than wired, plus I've got a phone with only one port for charging and earphones which makes these even more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Emhack

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Suits me just fine for regular gym use! It would have been nice to have a bit more quality bass but really that’s just asking for too much. No issues at all.. sweat all over them haven’t had any problems. Cable light enough not to get in the way when I’m jumping around or sprinting.
customer_reviews.author: ElleP

customer_reviews.title: Very poor reliability 2nd pair just died
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts approximately 35 mins. 5 minute power charge gives you no where near an hour as advertised. Update: I received a second pair on warranty which lasted longer but they have now died too (three flashing white lights and no other response). A fiend is on his third pair my wife is using a £15 pair that she bought when I bought the Beats and they are still going strong. Having looked online it appears that a lot of people have similar issues and you’re pretty much guaranteed, in my experience, to have issues with them. I’d avoid and won’t personally be buying Beats again.
customer_reviews.author: D E Warren

customer_reviews.title: Terrible call quality and cheap control
customer_reviews.text: Bought these not just for the sound quality but for the ability to make calls. What a joke. Sounds like you’re making a call from inside an electric shaver inside a washing machine. That’s no exaggeration. Terrible terrible design flaw unless I’ve picked an unlucky defective product. Very poor build of the remote also, looks very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Firms

customer_reviews.title: amazing sounds
customer_reviews.text: these are the only earphones that I can wear and are comfy and don't fall off/out of my ears. they sound amazing and the battery life is awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Iain

customer_reviews.title: Beats not so durable
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great & they are comfortable to wear. It’s great having no wires get in the way when running etc. my issue is that I’ve had to send them back twice for repairs so unfortunately they are not very durable. Bought a pair for partner & has had same problem. Shame really but wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Louise N. Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an affordadle price.
customer_reviews.text: Great, stylish product. Product comes with a variety of ear buds that can be used to get the correct for your inner ear. Sound quality on this product is amazing and at £79 these were a steal!
customer_reviews.author: maggsyyy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: Love them. The wire can be a bit annoying on the neck but I just bring it to the front when at the gym. Perfect otherwise and has a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: ShalN

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these, great sound quality and fit, had some people say they dont last very long or have good durability but touch wood, things are going ok so far!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound but flimsy build
customer_reviews.text: While I really enjoyed this product while it worked, I simply cannot recommend this product to others based purely on the build quality. I was initially skeptical of the quality issues raised by other reviewers however the power button broke within 2 weeks of purchase. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Peng

customer_reviews.title: Bought for partner xmas present
customer_reviews.text: He loved them! Said very good quality....he lost them on aeroplane though...didnt even have them 1 month! Lol 🙄 will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Keiraoh1

customer_reviews.title: 😦
customer_reviews.text: Good product but flimsy only uaed them about 4 times and already having problems woth the sound in the left earphone... annoyibg when youve paid tgat amount!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Not sweat proof
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for running. After just 2 months using on 3 runs a week they have stopped working. Sent back to apple. Without earphones for 3 weeks while they repair them. Good earphones as they stay put while running but based on the cost of the item i would suggest buying a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment, looking forward to taking it away with me on holiday with me and using much more
customer_reviews.author: Lindylou23

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality amazin
customer_reviews.text: Great set of head phones. They were the first wireless headphones I got that worked, and didn’t keep falling out of my ears! Dramatic to say life changing but...........they made a massive difference!
customer_reviews.author: MR L N Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: In the end I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big beats fan. I have the studio wireless version which is great and has lasted years. I wanted a smaller more compact options than the studio wireless which is why I bought these. Today, a year and a half later, the right earbud stopped working. I do expect that when I spend so much on earphones they would last longer than a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. V. I. Galabov

customer_reviews.title: Great, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great bit of kit, fits well on my ears and stays on when training. Easy to control and connect to my phone. Very clear when I use it for a phone call on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting beats to offer quality sound. However, the real experience tells me it is not. The money I paid for is not worth. A wireless earphone under 10 can run just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Fireman

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out
customer_reviews.text: Loved the battery life on this baby I almost never need to charge it (maybe once a couple weeks). It's great for when you're in the gym on your rock playlist getting the pump. Great buy *pat on shoulder*
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones, just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I own both these and the Air Pods by Apple. I now only use the Air pods and for a better sound i use the Beats Studio wireless head phones. Anyone want to buy these let me know :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beat it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bass but bad high and mid range. They won't fall off but I find they hurt around the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic earphones. Connected to my phone quickly and has a very good range. So far no problem. Seems very sturdy for gym use. Good range of sound.
customer_reviews.author: J R Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting..
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 6 months , plastic flimsy, very expensive, not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: howardyve

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not as far in front
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting great things though not as far in front of other cheaper brands and was expecting more performance and range for the money particularly in the bass ranges
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. K. Yellop

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase; exactly as described and easy to install and use straight away. Super sleek ergonomic design; very easy to navigate and fits perfectly. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jan76

customer_reviews.title: Eight months later and the battery doesn't charge and the headphones are useless. this appears to be a recurring problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a Christmas present. Eight months later and the battery doesn't charge and the headphones are useless. this appears to be a recurring problem with this type of Beats headphone. I would strongly recommend not purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kiernan

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and no longer work
customer_reviews.text: Had them since Christmas and no longer work. I use them max 3 times a week. When I charge the earphones they switch on, but as soon as I take them off charge (after 1 hour charge), they automatically switch off and will not turn back on. Hopefully someone sees this, and can help.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Walker

customer_reviews.title: These are as good as the Bose options and the hands free calling ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived next day. I purchased these to replace rha ma750's. Powerbeats are head and shoulders above the rha headphones. These are as good as the Bose options and the hands free calling is working great. Sound quality is great and they seem to have got the bass just right (for me) it's not as over powering as it used to be on the older beats headphones.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Size of ears
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The only concern I had wasn’t really a manufacturing issue but my 13 year old struggles to keep the earphones in his ears as his ears are small. There are different sizes of earphone ‘pads’ but he just needs to grow a bit more and then they’ll be perfect. Other than that, all great.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth bishop

customer_reviews.title: Substandard quality
customer_reviews.text: On my fourth set and all stop working after a couple of months. After some research sale problem is seen all over the world. Work great initially and then are unable to pair with any device and controls are unresponsive. Don’t plan on ever buying another beats product
customer_reviews.author: Derek Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy to wear and sound very good
customer_reviews.text: These were for my grandson but he seems very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Green

customer_reviews.title: Great fit fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product my granddaughter is into every sport and are perfect for purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The brake after about a year and 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The head phone are amazing, grate sound, cumftorble to use easy and straightforward too. But there is one big problem the are rubbish at holding then self's together the mic case brock ear straps sun stuck from each other and the head phone its self come off so I'm not happy only had them a year a 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: callum

customer_reviews.title: i haven't had them 12 months yet and they will ...
customer_reviews.text: i haven't had them 12 months yet and they will no longer charge. i am trying to get them replaced but no such luck as yet.
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Item !
customer_reviews.text: Works good with iPhone 8 plus. Using few weeks ago. No problem
customer_reviews.author: Laser-san

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product for lots of money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth the price tag. I had return them after a week, due very poor quality sound. They don’t even stay on the ears once you become a little bit sweaty. Definitely not suited to running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit expensive you can still hear people around u in the gym even turned right up
customer_reviews.author: victoria2

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones.
customer_reviews.text: Nice earphones. Not sure why these get negative reviews. Nice deep base to them, long Bluetooth range & I go longer than a week between charges. very comfy at the gym, hold in place doing allsrots of exercises, weights,treadmill,eliptical, you name it, they don't fall out!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Orme-Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones are loud too just what I wanted item come on time and it's worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jones

customer_reviews.title: lasted just over 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I had to reorder a new set of these as the last ones only lasted just over one year. I did go through all the reset processdures, but they were simply dead. I hope the second pair last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Son wanted these for when he’s at the gym and loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother ...
customer_reviews.text: The cable joining the headset is far too short and therefore every time you turn your head at the gym can pull headphones out. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Nevets

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE SOUND QUALITY WARNING!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have headphones that are £20 that sound better then these garbage headphones sound quality is absolutely terrible, I highly advise you stay away from these headphones, it's just the brand name your paying for porly built with terrible sound quality enough said
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Shah

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great however after buying this a month ago the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great however after buying this a month ago the battery switches off mid workout after 20-30 mins of play
customer_reviews.author: Dean Kirk

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had multiple pairs of the PowerBeats and once you use these you can never use anything else after. My ears don't suit other headsets so this is perfect for it. With an iPhone there are extra features that you can use on Beats. YES!! definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawit I Mehari

customer_reviews.title: Why I returned it
customer_reviews.text: A good product only issue for me was the ear hooks that hurt my ears, but should work for most
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but brittle.
customer_reviews.text: I liked them over all as they were great for the gym and were secure with good battery life/charging time but when I had them in the travel case in my pocket the part that folds around my ear had snapped off. The travel case is only a soft silicone pod which doesn’t really protect them. 6/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total fraud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October and in December I barely get 40 mins worth when I listen to music. I have tired to contact the seller but the returned window is closed. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tuedon Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The microphone was not working when i received the powerbeats ...
customer_reviews.text: The microphone was not working when i received the powerbeats and when i tried Apple Genius bar i found out the product was 53 days out of warranty. I was told the product was already sold twice before. I paid for a new product not a third hand one !!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Freri

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these earphones because of the name and the price. The sound is very good and I like the look of them but sadly, I could not wear them for too long. I personally found them uncomfortable after a while.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a gift and loved from the moment they were opened. Great quality of sound, battery life is amazing (approx 12hrs) & comfortable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: There are better products for better price.
customer_reviews.text: The thing that should go around your ears, broke after 2 months of having them. Waste of 100+ pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Kristupas (Chris)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought headphones as a present for my wife. She uses them daily on her iPhone 6s and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: ceejay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, as per Beats, now my son wants a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine jones

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the volume ,my original beats wireless went up a least another 3increases I.e power beats level 10 then my original beats go up to 13
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: ... about the other reviews but I think these are great. Bass it a little less than the wired ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about the other reviews but I think these are great. Bass it a little less than the wired urbeats but still great sound quality. Would recommend for any sport, they don’t fall out of your ears like wired headphones. Very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Thurman Merman

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: My earphone broke today. Need to find if there is a way to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Anto

customer_reviews.title: Powerbeats3 - how can the cost so much and deliver such poor reliability?
customer_reviews.text: Bought for £125 18 months ago. Maybe I shouldn't have expected the Beats earphones to work for too long but for a relatively expensive and renowned brand and or earphones I haven't used that much I expected longer than 18 months. Really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but always works well
customer_reviews.text: Solid sound, great fit and battery lasts a long time. Tried a bunch of the £20 headphones but they kept breaking. So far so good with this one
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. E. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 6 mouths use
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't working any more after 6 months. I think the shops are still the way forward for this type of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Took them off charge to go to the gym and they won't turn on, I get three flashing lights then it switches back off. I searched online and there are many cases of this occuring and no solutions ! Very disappointed. Do not purchase, unreliable!
customer_reviews.author: Dillan Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Gym
customer_reviews.text: Legit Beats. They're brilliant and I love using them to work out in. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Armitage

customer_reviews.title: Daughter does not use them
customer_reviews.text: Not a great hit with my daughter as she does not use them as not too comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: I thought for sure these would stay on, but they don't . especially if you wear glasses or a scarf.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Frohman

customer_reviews.title: Best ear phones used to date
customer_reviews.text: Great for in the gym, good quality sound and don’t move at all. Only issue is not able to change song or volume on the actual headphone
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great service, delivered on time  Head phones were brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: I have had power beats before They were brilliant as usual
customer_reviews.author: Dicky.one

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present. Happy 14 year old is testament to the headphones. Sound, and more importantly look, good.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wear, easy to set up and use. Easy to charge. Very convenient for modern day life and would definitely recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: M1987

product_meta.title: Powerbeats3 Wireless Earphones - Apple W1 Headphone Chip, Class 1 Bluetooth, 12 Hours Of Listening Time, Sweat Resistant Earbuds - Black
feature_bullets: Compatible with iOS and Android devices.
Connectivity Technology: Apple’s W1 Chip and Wireless Connect via Class 1 Bluetooth with your device for wireless workout freedom
Up to 12 hours of battery life to power through multiple workouts
With Fast Fuel, a 5-minute charge gives you 1 hour of playback when battery is low
Sweat and water resistance to handle tough training.
Flexible, secure-fit earhooks maximize comfort and stability while in the gym or running
Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with the multifunction on-ear controls and microphone
What's in the box: Powerbeats3 Wireless earphones, eartips with four (4) size options, carrying case, universal USB charging cable (USB-A to USB Micro-B, Quick Start Guide, warranty card
